title: Re_ donation of court opinions
abstract:
From: Karen_Redmond@ao.uscourts.gov
Subject: Re: donation of court opinions
Date: March 18, 2008 7:35:00 AM PDT
To: Carl Malamud <Carl@media.org>
Mr. Malamud:  My apologies for not getting back to you sooner.  Our Judicial Conference was last week and it was a bit hectic.  Thank you for thinking of
us for your donation.  I've passed your e-mail along to the appropriate offices and I hope to get back to you very soon. 
Thank you again! 
Karen 
Carl Malamud <Carl@media.org>
03/11/2008 03:59 PM
To
